title: Access-to-information systems across Canada slowed by COVID-19
description: An international human rights organization is calling on all levels of government in Canada to continue answering access-to-information requests — and prioritize ones that relate to government accountability.
content: An international human rights organization is calling on all levels of government in Canada to continue answering access to information requests and prioritize ones that relate to government accountability As governments across the country move to offer ess chars
